description: This method will load a dataset, either form PaddleNLP library or from aself-defined data loading script, by calling functions in DatasetBuilder.For all the names of datasets in PaddleNLP library, see here:  dataset_list.Either splits or data_files must be specified.path_or_read_func (str|callable) – Name of the dataset processing scriptin PaddleNLP library or a custom data reading function.name (str, optional) – Additional name to select a more specific dataset.Defaults to None.data_files (str|list|tuple|dict, optional) – Defining the path of datasetfiles. If None. splits must be specified. Defaults to None.splits (str|list|tuple, optional) – Which split of the data to load. If None.data_files must be specified. Defaults to None.lazy (bool, optional) – Weather to return MapDataset or an IterDataset.True for IterDataset. False for MapDataset. If None, return thedefault type of this dataset. Defaults to None.kwargs (dict) – Other keyword arguments to be passed to the DatasetBuilder.A MapDataset or IterDataset or a tuple of those.For how to use this function, please see dataset_loadand dataset_self_defined

params.name: path_or_read_func
params.description: Name of the dataset processing scriptin PaddleNLP library or a custom data reading function.

params.name: name
params.description: Additional name to select a more specific dataset.Defaults to None.

params.name: data_files
params.type: str or list or tuple or dict
params.description: Defining the path of datasetfiles. If None. splits must be specified. Defaults to None.

params.name: splits
params.description: Which split of the data to load. If None.data_files must be specified. Defaults to None.

params.name: lazy
params.description: Weather to return MapDataset or an IterDataset.True for IterDataset. False for MapDataset. If None, return thedefault type of this dataset. Defaults to None.

params.name: kwargs
params.description: Other keyword arguments to be passed to the DatasetBuilder.

return.description: A MapDataset or IterDataset or a tuple of those.
